AppDB.Name: STIF_QSIZE_INIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table initiate the STIF queue size mode per source

AppDB.Name: STIF_QSIZE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures the STIF queue size flow control low/high

Field.Description: Two valid source for flow control - enq and deq (internal and external)
Field.Name: STIF_QSIZE_SOURCE

AppDB.Name: STIF_QSIZE_SCRUBBER_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table initiate and configure the STIF queue size scrubber configuration

AppDB.Name: STIF_BILLING_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table initiate and configure the STIF billing mode

AppDB.Name: STIF_INSTANCE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the settings of the given STIF port instance

AppDB.Name: STIF_ACTIVE_QSIZE_SOURCE_PER_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table presents a bitmap of active sources per port

AppDB.Name: STIF_ACTIVE_BILLING_SOURCE_PER_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table presents a bitmap of active sources per port

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_SCRUBBER_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM scrubber settings

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_SCRUBBER_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM scrubber thresholds intervals

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_QSIZE_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM qsize settings

Field.Description: 1'b0 - report SRAM Qsize, 1'b1 - report combined Qsize (SRAM + DRAM)
Field.Name: QSIZE_REPORT_SEL

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_BILLING_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM billing settings

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_BILLING_STAMP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM stamp - shift and mask for each attribute of the record

AppDB.Name: STIF_ETPP_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is related to STIF ETPP settings

Field.Description: From where the statistic bus arrived
Field.Name: STIF_ETPP_BUS_IDENTIFIER

Field.Description: External statistic enabler in trap forward action table
Field.Name: STIF_ETPP_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: STIF_ETPP_REPORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF ETPP report and metadata - shift

AppDB.Name: STIF_ETPP_METADATA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF ETPP metadata fields shift

AppDB.Name: STIF_COMPENSATION_MASKS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures the activation of STIF header compensation masks

AppDB.Name: STIF_CGM_FILTER_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF CGM billing settings

AppDB.Name: STIF_ETPP_CORE_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures STIF ETPP core id report element
